data: Hello! World, This is a test; string. It includes multiple punctuation: marks, such as - period, comma, exclamation! question? semicolon; colon: hyphen- apostrophe' parentheses() brackets[] braces{} tilde~ backtick` at@ hash# dollar$ percent% caret^ ampersand& asterisk* underscore_ plus+ equal= less< greater> vertical| slash/ backslash\.
